data.name: Madrid Noir Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original soundtrack composed for Madrid Noir that highlights all the memorable moments of the game. An emotionally moving and heartwarming OST that accompanies Lola along her journey, as she looks after her uncle.

Music by Carlos Rodriguez Rodiguez

Total duration: 34min56s
